    public class CodeFarmBackEnd
extends java.lang.Object

    Demo class to show reference implementation of front-end to back-end interface

    Implements the CodeFarmInterface interface

      • getCodes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Code> getCodes(int n,
                                 int frontEndId,
                                 int codeSpaceId)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: CodeFarmInterface
        Gets some codes from a Registered Code Space and returns them as an ArrayList
        Specified by:
        getCodes in interface CodeFarmInterface
        Parameters:
        n - The number of codes to get
        frontEndId - The Front End that has the Code Space
        codeSpaceId - the Code Space ID of the Code Space to get the codes from
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the returned Code objects
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the Front End ID or the Code Space ID are not found

                    int codeLen,
                    char[] excludes)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: CodeFarmInterface
        Registers a Code Space within a Front End and returns a new Code Space ID
        Specified by:
        registerCodeSpace in interface CodeFarmInterface
        Parameters:
        frontEndId - The ID of the Front End to add the Code Space to
        codeLen - The length of the code that should be used by the CodeFormatter
        excludes - A char array of the characters that should be excluded by the CodeFormatter
        Returns:
        The Code Space ID for the created CodeSpace
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the Front End ID is not found
